text:

GP or health visitor, or contact 
the National Breastfeeding 
Helpline on 0300 100 0212.
Note that if your baby seems 
unusually sleepy and/or is slow 
to start feeding, they may be ill, 
so contact your GP as soon as 
possible.
How do I know my baby is 
getting enough milk?
• Your baby should be 
healthy and alert.
• In	the	first	48	hours,	your	
baby is likely to have only 
two or three wet nappies. 
Wet nappies should then 
start to become more
